name: Stratus Pants Green
name_cn: 层云 裤子 绿色
description: Casual comfort that you can wear anywhere. The Stratus pants feature a soft comfort waistband that perfectly embraces your hips, and distinct reinforced paneling to ensure long wear and supreme style.
description_cn: 舒适休闲，随处可穿. "层云"长裤采用柔软舒适的腰带，完美包裹臀部，独特的强化镶板确保你可以穿着长久，风格出众.
